bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition Combined Designation of five types of cough, including shang qi sou 上氣嗽 , cough with ascending qi; yin sou 飲嗽 , rheum cough; zao sou 燥嗽 , dry cough; leng sou 冷 嗽 , cold cough; xie sou 邪嗽 , evil [qi] cough. Wai tai mi yao 外台秘要 9: 深師療五嗽，一曰上 氣嗽，二曰飲嗽，三曰燥嗽，四曰冷嗽，五曰邪嗽 , “Master Shen cures the five types of cough . The first is called ‘qi cough’, the second is called ‘rheum cough’, the third is called ‘dry cough’, the fourth is called ‘cold cough’, the fifth is called ‘evil [qi] cough ’”.
